options.content:
The System Technical Budget Tables - Production is based on
- the data budget reference document [\[ESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9\] CSC Operations – ESA Framework – System Technical Budget.pdf](https://omcs.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/66158618/%5BESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9%5D%20CSC%20Operations%20%E2%80%93%20ESA%20Framework%20%E2%80%93%20System%20Technical%20Budget.pdf?api=v2).
- the data flow reference document [\[ESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-58\] CSC GS Data Flow Configuration.pdf](https://omcs.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/66158618/%5BESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-58%5D%20CSC%20GS%20Data%20Flow%20Configuration.pdf?api=v2).

Data flow document extraction is visible in the ["Data Flow dashboard"](./d/MfmL_E4Vz/golden-rules-and-data-flow?orgId=1) 

# Data selected

From [\[ESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9\] CSC Operations – ESA Framework – System Technical Budget.pdf](https://omcs.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/66158618/%5BESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9%5D%20CSC%20Operations%20%E2%80%93%20ESA%20Framework%20%E2%80%93%20System%20Technical%20Budget.pdf?api=v2) document some assuption are made to provide the System Technical Budget dashboards.


For System Technical Budget Tables - Production the data published at PRIP are selected.

-Section Data Preservation data published at PRIP.

**Data collection** are considered as consistent since **01/08/2022**

**Data collection** for **aquisition** are considered as consistent since **15/03/2023**

Values are mean by satellite number in mission. (i.e. S1 1 satellite, S2 mean of 2 satellite, S3 mean of 2 satellite; S5 1 satellite )

Rmq : There is today no S5 L0 data published at prip.

# Annexes

## Product type selected

The table below present how products types are classified in STB level and STB timeliness: 

### For panel**System Technical Budget( On Range)**: 

|Mission|STB Level|STB Timeliness|Real timeliness|Misc.|Product Type|

|S1|L2|NTC|NTC||EW_OCN__2A,EW_OCN__2S,IW_OCN__2A,IW_OCN__2S,S1_OCN__2A,S1_OCN__2S,S2_OCN__2A,S2_OCN__2S,S3_OCN__2A,S3_OCN__2S,S4_OCN__2A,S4_OCN__2S,S5_OCN__2A,S5_OCN__2S,S6_OCN__2A,S6_OCN__2S,WV_OCN__2A,WV_OCN__2S|
|S1|L2|NRT|NRT,NRT-PT||EW_OCN__2A,EW_OCN__2S,IW_OCN__2A,IW_OCN__2S|
|S2|L0|NTC|NOMINAL||MSI_L0__DS,MSI_L0__GR|

|S3|L1|NRT|NR,AL||MW_1_CAL___,MW_1_MWR___,OL_1_EFR___,OL_1_ERR___,OL_1_RAC___,OL_1_SPC___,SL_1_RBT___,SR_1_CAL___,SR_1_SRA___|

###Fortheotherspanelinthedashboard: 

Data cames form System Technical Budget( On Range) panel.

# Dashboard usage

On left top of the dashboard the mean combobox allow to select mean period: 
- by day: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 1 day.
- by week: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 7 day.
- by month: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 30 day.
- by year: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 365 day.

Time reference for this dashboard is: sensing_start_date

Important notice: Tables & timelines can only display up to 10000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query: ( mission:S1 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_RAW__0A OR product_type:EW_RAW__0C OR product_type:EW_RAW__0N OR product_type:EW_RAW__0S OR product_type:IW_RAW__0A OR product_type:IW_RAW__0C OR product_type:IW_RAW__0N OR product_type:IW_RAW__0S OR product_type:RF_RAW OR product_type:S1_RAW__0A OR product_type:S1_RAW__0C OR product_type:S1_RAW__0N OR product_type:S1_RAW__0S OR product_type:S2_RAW__0A OR product_type:S2_RAW__0C OR product_type:S2_RAW__0N OR product_type:S2_RAW__0S OR product_type:S3_RAW__0A OR product_type:S3_RAW__0C OR product_type:S3_RAW__0N OR product_type:S3_RAW__0S OR product_type:S4_RAW__0A OR product_type:S4_RAW__0C OR product_type:S4_RAW__0N OR product_type:S4_RAW__0S OR product_type:S5_RAW__0A OR product_type:S5_RAW__0C OR product_type:S5_RAW__0N OR product_type:S5_RAW__0S OR product_type:S6_RAW__0A OR product_type:S6_RAW__0C OR product_type:S6_RAW__0N OR product_type:S6_RAW__0S OR product_type:WV_RAW__0A OR product_type:WV_RAW__0C OR product_type:WV_RAW__0N OR product_type:WV_RAW__0S ) AND ( timeliness:NTC )  )  )

( mission:S1 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_RAW__0A OR product_type:EW_RAW__0C OR product_type:EW_RAW__0N OR product_type:EW_RAW__0S OR product_type:IW_RAW__0A OR product_type:IW_RAW__0C OR product_type:IW_RAW__0N OR product_type:IW_RAW__0S ) AND ( timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT )  )  )

( mission:S1 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_GRDM_1A OR product_type:EW_GRDM_1S OR product_type:EW_SLC__1A OR product_type:EW_SLC__1S OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1A OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1S OR product_type:IW_SLC__1A OR product_type:IW_SLC__1S ) AND ( timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT )  )  )

( mission:S1 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_GRDM_1A OR product_type:EW_GRDM_1S OR product_type:EW_SLC__1A OR product_type:EW_SLC__1S OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1A OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1S OR product_type:IW_SLC__1A OR product_type:IW_SLC__1S OR product_type:S1_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S1_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S1_SLC__1A OR product_type:S1_SLC__1S OR product_type:S2_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S2_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S2_SLC__1A OR product_type:S2_SLC__1S OR product_type:S3_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S3_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S3_SLC__1A OR product_type:S3_SLC__1S OR product_type:S4_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S4_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S4_SLC__1A OR product_type:S4_SLC__1S OR product_type:S5_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S5_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S5_SLC__1A OR product_type:S5_SLC__1S OR product_type:S6_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S6_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S6_SLC__1A OR product_type:S6_SLC__1S OR product_type:WV_SLC__1A OR product_type:WV_SLC__1S ) AND ( timeliness:NTC )  )  )

( mission:S1 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_OCN__2A OR product_type:EW_OCN__2S OR product_type:IW_OCN__2A OR product_type:IW_OCN__2S OR product_type:S1_OCN__2A OR product_type:S1_OCN__2S OR product_type:S2_OCN__2A OR product_type:S2_OCN__2S OR product_type:S3_OCN__2A OR product_type:S3_OCN__2S OR product_type:S4_OCN__2A OR product_type:S4_OCN__2S OR product_type:S5_OCN__2A OR product_type:S5_OCN__2S OR product_type:S6_OCN__2A OR product_type:S6_OCN__2S OR product_type:WV_OCN__2A OR product_type:WV_OCN__2S ) AND ( timeliness:NTC )  )  )

( mission:S1 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_OCN__2A OR product_type:EW_OCN__2S OR product_type:IW_OCN__2A OR product_type:IW_OCN__2S ) AND ( timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT )  )  )
( mission:S2 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L0__DS OR product_type:MSI_L0__GR ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
( mission:S2 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L1A_DS OR product_type:MSI_L1A_GR ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
( mission:S2 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L1B_DS OR product_type:MSI_L1B_GR ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
( mission:S2 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L1C___  OR product_type:MSI_L1C_DS OR product_type:MSI_L1C_TC OR product_type:MSI_L1C_TL ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
( mission:S2 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L2A___  OR product_type:MSI_L2A_DS OR product_type:MSI_L2A_TC OR product_type:MSI_L2A_TL ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
( mission:S3 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OL_0_EFR___ OR product_type:SL_0_SLT___ ) AND ( timeliness:NT )  )  )

( mission:S3 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:DO_0_DOP___ OR product_type:DO_0_NAV___ OR product_type:GN_0_GNS___ OR product_type:MW_0_MWR___ OR product_type:OL_0_CR0___ OR product_type:OL_0_CR1___ OR product_type:OL_0_EFR___ OR product_type:SL_0_SLT___ OR product_type:SR_0_CAL___ OR product_type:SR_0_SRA___ OR product_type:TM_0_HKM___ OR product_type:TM_0_HKM2__ OR product_type:TM_0_NAT___ ) AND ( timeliness:NR OR timeliness:AL )  )  OR (   ( product_type:SR_0_SRA___ ) AND ( timeliness:ST )  )  )

( mission:S3 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MW_1_MWR___ OR product_type:OL_1_EFR___ OR product_type:OL_1_ERR___ OR product_type:SL_1_RBT___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_A_ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_BS OR product_type:SY_1_MISR__ ) AND ( timeliness:NT )  )  )

( mission:S3 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MW_1_CAL___ OR product_type:MW_1_MWR___ OR product_type:OL_1_EFR___ OR product_type:OL_1_ERR___ OR product_type:OL_1_RAC___ OR product_type:OL_1_SPC___ OR product_type:SL_1_RBT___ OR product_type:SR_1_CAL___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA___ ) AND ( timeliness:NR OR timeliness:AL )  )  OR (   ( product_type:MW_1_MWR___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_A_ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_BS OR product_type:SY_1_MISR__ ) AND ( timeliness:ST )  )  )

( mission:S3 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OL_2_LFR___ OR product_type:OL_2_LRR___ OR product_type:SL_2_FRP___ OR product_type:SL_2_LST___ OR product_type:SR_2_LAN___ OR product_type:SY_2_AOD___ OR product_type:SY_2_SYN___ OR product_type:SY_2_V10___ OR product_type:SY_2_VG1___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGK___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGP___ ) AND ( timeliness:NT )  )  )

( mission:S3 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OL_2_LFR___ OR product_type:OL_2_LRR___ OR product_type:SL_2_LST___ OR product_type:SR_2_LAN___ ) AND ( timeliness:NR OR timeliness:AL )  )  OR (   ( product_type:SR_2_LAN___ OR product_type:SY_2_SYN___ OR product_type:SY_2_V10___ OR product_type:SY_2_VG1___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGK___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGP___ ) AND ( timeliness:ST )  )  )

( mission:S5 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OPER_L0__ENG_A_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_1_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_2_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_3_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_4_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_5_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_6_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_7_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_8_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__SAT_A_ ) AND ( timeliness:OPER )  )  )

( mission:S5 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OFFL_L1B_CA_SIR OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_CA_UVN OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_ENG_DB OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_IR_SIR OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_IR_UVN OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD1 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD2 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD3 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD4 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD5 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD6 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD7 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD8 ) AND ( timeliness:OFFL )  )  )

( mission:S5 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:NRTI_L1B_ENG_DB OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD1 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD2 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD3 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD4 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD5 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD6 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD7 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD8 ) AND ( timeliness:NRTI )  )  )

( mission:S5 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OFFL_L2__03_TCL OR product_type:OFFL_L2__AER_AI OR product_type:OFFL_L2__AER_LH OR product_type:OFFL_L2__CH4_ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__CLOUD_ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__CO____ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__FRESCO OR product_type:OFFL_L2__HCHO_ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NO2___ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NP_BD3 OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NP_BD6 OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NP_BD7 OR product_type:OFFL_L2__O3____ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__O3__PR OR product_type:OFFL_L2__SO2___ ) AND ( timeliness:OFFL )  )  )

( mission:S5 AND service_type:PRIP )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:NRTI_L2__03_TCL OR product_type:NRTI_L2__AER_AI OR product_type:NRTI_L2__AER_LH OR product_type:NRTI_L2__CLOUD_ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__CO____ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__FRESCO OR product_type:NRTI_L2__HCCO_ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__NO2___ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__O3____ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__O3__PR OR product_type:NRTI_L2__SO2___ ) AND ( timeliness:NRTI )  )  )

list.description: Select mean interval on the period: none (value on the period), by day, by week (day * 7), by month (day * 30), by year (day * 365)
list.label: Mean
list.name: mean_period
list.query: by day : 86400, by week : 604800, by month : 2592000, by year : 31536000
